name: club-management-system
description: Membership and facilities management system for members-only club

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix="[{name}]" --names="server,client,tests" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:tests"
scripts.dev:tests: sleep 10 && cd tests && npm run test:watch
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:server && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:tests
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:client
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/node_modules client/node_modules tests/node_modules node_modules && rm -rf server/dist client/dist
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
